title: Never got Donation Reward
body: A week or two ago, I donated twenty five dollars to the Riot Impact Challenge, meaning I would receive a mystery gift and summoner icon. For a while, I thought that the rewards had yet to be given out, until I saw some people with the icon, while I still have yet to receive my rewards. Can I get some help with this?

replies.body: You should receive an email with a code for the icon through the address used at [Omaze](https://www.omaze.com/login).  If you still haven't received it, you can check on the status through their site.  If you still have any concerns, hit up their [support ](https://support.omaze.com/hc/en-us)to get this sorted out.  Hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=QL6RAERq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-22T16:15:25.721+0000)
>
> You should receive an email with a code for the icon through the address used at [Omaze](https://www.omaze.com/login).  If you still haven't received it, you can check on the status through their site.  If you still have any concerns, hit up their [support ](https://support.omaze.com/hc/en-us)to get this sorted out.  Hope that helps!

Sorry for not replying before, but I just now got around to looking through my email, and then going to the Omaze website. It seems that my card was declined when I attempted the donation, so I attempted again to much greater success. Thanks for the help!
